text: Nawab Banoo (18 February 1933 â€“ 25 March 2020), better known by her stage name Nimmi, was an Indian actress. Nimmi was born in Agra, United Provinces of Agra and Oudh, British India, (present-day Uttar Pradesh, India). She became known in the 1950s and early 1960s in Hindi movies. Her best roles were in Sazaa (1951), Aan (1952), Uran Khatola (1955), Bhai-Bhai (1956), Kundan (1955), Mere Mehboob (1963), Pooja Ke Phool (1964), Akashdeep (1965), and Love and God (1986). Nimmi died on 25 March 2020 at her home in Mumbai of a heart attack at the age of 87.Veteran Actress Nimmi Aka Nawab Banoo Passes Away At 87Veteran actor Nimmi dies at 87, Rishi Kapoor and Mahesh Bhatt lead Bollywood in paying tribute ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Indian movie actors
title: Nimmi
